Uses of Class
com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.auth.AbstractAWSSigner

  • Packages that use AbstractAWSSigner 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.auth  
    com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.oauth  
    com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.services.s3.internal  

    • Uses of AbstractAWSSigner in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.auth

      Subclasses of AbstractAWSSigner in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.auth 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AWS3Signer
      Signer implementation that signs requests with the AWS3 signing protocol.
      class  AWS4Signer
      Signer implementation that signs requests with the AWS4 signing protocol.
      class  AWS4UnsignedPayloadSigner
      Exactly the same as AWS4Signer except if the request is being sent over HTTPS, then it returns the string UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD as the content SHA-256 so services that support it can avoid needing to calculate the value when authorizing the request.
      class  QueryStringSigner
      Signer implementation responsible for signing an AWS query string request according to the various signature versions and hashing algorithms.

    • Uses of AbstractAWSSigner in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.oauth

      Subclasses of AbstractAWSSigner in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.oauth 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IBMOAuthSigner
      Signer implementation that signs requests with the OAuth 2.0 signing protocol.

    • Uses of AbstractAWSSigner in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.services.s3.internal

      Subclasses of AbstractAWSSigner in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.services.s3.internal 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AWSS3V4Signer
      AWS4 signer implementation for Amazon Web Services S3
      class  S3QueryStringSigner 
      class  S3Signer
      Implementation of the Signer interface specific to S3's signing algorithm.
